value: content=An underground river through a limestone cavern. It goes into the Sinks and comes out at a pool called the Rise.

Rock Climbers Festival 
4th of July Parade, buffalo BBQ and Rodeo
Lander has many great locally-owned restaurants to serve a wide variety of tastes and budgets.

- 1350 Main Street - (307) 332-6090
The Breadboard offers a variety of fresh and delicious sub sandwiches.  It is a bit more expensive than Subway, but well worth it!  The bread is homemade from scratch and excellent.

- 545 Main Street - (307) 332-9728
Wildflour is another fantastic sandwich shop.  They serve excellent breakfast and lunch sandwiches, as well as a wide variety of other baked goods, coffee drinks, and Italian sodas.  Sandwiches can be made on bagels or exploding cheese bread - a house specialty where cheese is mixed in the dough before it is baked.  Prices are very reasonable.

- 637 West Main Street - (307) 332-3900
Tony's Pizza has great pizza, pasta, and salads.  During the summer months, you can dine on the rooftop.  Sometimes, when the restaurant is busy, the service can be a bit slow, but it is always very friendly!

(307) 332-9298
Great Mexican food, especially for a small town in Wyoming.

- 126 Main Street - (307) 332-8228
The Gannett Grill is part of The Lander Bar and the Cowfish.  Gannett serves great bar food: burgers, pizza, sandwiches, and salad. A burger with great fries costs around $8-$10 

The Cowfish is a higher end restaurant that serves locally grown steaks and seafood.  This is a great place to go in Lander to treat yourself! Dinner entrees cost around $28+

Gannett and the Cowfish offer a wide selection of microbrews also.There is a great patio shared by both restaurants for outdoor dining in the summer months.

- 785 E Main St - (307) 332-4322
"The Rack" is another great steakhouse. Wonderful atmosphere and great food. It has a small but adequate salad bar that always has excellent soups!

- 140 North 7th Street - (307) 335-7171
This small restaurant has great food from a variety of Asian countries.

162 North 6th Street - (307) 332-7666
The China Garden has very good Chinese food and is very reasonably priced.
